testcase.name: getPostCall

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["Id","Mobile"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["Id","Mobile","email","favfood","frst_name","last_name","marks","subjects"] missing: ["Id","Mobile"]
Actual: { "id": 3999, "frst_name": "Deanne", "last_name": "Monahan", "email": "jagan234@gmail.com", "mobile": "1-457-864-7337", "marks": [ { "telugu": 96, "english": 69, "maths": 99, "science": 89, "social": 78, "hindi": 67, "ed": 75, "kom": 64, "te": 68 }, { "telugu": 69, "english": 62, "maths": 89, "science": 79, "social": 68, "hindi": 67, "ed": 75, "kom": 64, "te": 86 } ], "subjects": [ "S.O.M", "fluid mechanics", "engineering mechanics" ], "favfood": { "breakfast": "idly", "lunch": "rice", "dinner": [ "chapathi", "Kaddukakheer", "curdrice" ] } }
